channel.title: ~[PI]~ Server IP
channel.description:
How Do I Change The Server IP In A PI Source Here Is The Source I Used! I Search ".org" And "no-ip" and "Servergame.com" in Both File And Made Them All "127.0.0.1" But When I Load Client And Source And Try To Login It Says Error Connecting To Server! PLEASE HELP ME!
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,460494.msg3368998.html#msg3368998
NOT ADVERTISING JUST SHOWING!

item.title: ~[PI]~ Server IP
item.dc:creator: @_C_oder_P_erses [C]oder [P]erses
item.description:
@_C_oder_P_erses wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Filename class != Filename.class

When someone is referring to Java, and they say class (notice, no period between the name, and the class) they are referring to the Java file. Though, when someone says .class (notice the period, thus this is an extension) they are referring to the Class bytecode file.[/quote]Ohh, Okay Lol I Didn’t See That There Was No Period… Lol Sorry… But I Made All The Things 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Usually it’s in the Client class, but some servers have in it included with the JFrame/GUI classes. So it could be in either Client or GUI class.[/quote]What Do I Open Client.class In? Notepad?
